overview:
DESCRIPTION

Qseap Technologies is an IT Products and Services provider along with Business Consulting. Qseap Technologies Pvt. Ltd. is a Customer focused IT firm whose primary point of focus is the growth in business of the Enterprise Organizations. Qseap emphasizes in extrapolating the business logic for its customers and discover the precise prospects for the growth of sales and revenues.

www.qseap.com

www.qseap.net

SKILLS

  1. Network & Application Security
  2. Software / Application Development
  3. Quality Assurance & Software Testing
  4. Reporting (Business Intelligence)
  5. Retail Management
  6. Hospital Management
  7. ERP
  8. Website Development
  9. Open Source Migration & Custom Development
  10. Bulk SMS Services
  11. Green Technology and Green IT Consultation

LOCATION India - Pune, Maharashtra
